title: My Picture - When the speaker says the artist will

content.question: When the speaker says the artist will deny ever having seen him (lines 5â€“6), he means that

choices.label: no one would wish to be associated with someone so broken by age
not even the artist's precise knowledge of him could detect any likeness
no one was available to receive the picture when it was finished
the portrait was a likeness in every respect but facial features

content.answer: not even the artist's precise knowledge of him could detect any likeness

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
